text: ao aah li kitea b. chea karpit nasa anakneasar( mou ham meat) robsa yeung ban mokadl puok anak delke ban banhcheak brab puok anak cheachraen mk haey ampi avei del puok anak thleab ban leakbang nowknong kompir( ta v rt) haey ke ka leukleng( min banhcheak brab)cheachraen der . ponlu( mou ham meat) ning kompir( kuor an) da cheakchbasa mk pi a l laoh pitchea ban mokadl puok anak
